item.title: Velociraptor Threathunting - Quick Introduction
item.description: In my previous posts I’ve shown how to use Velociraptor to extract artefacts from dead hosts, but the real strength of Velociraptor is in its capability to do searches across multiple hosts for artefacts. This is really useful when responders are trying to determine the questions such as “Are there baddies in the network?", “How many machines have executable X on it?", “Did user X log on to system Y?” etc.
